description:
Saber of Black is http://anidb.net/ch89996 [Gordes Musik Yggdmillennia]`s Servant. Upon http://anidb.net/ch88726 [Sieg]`s imminent death, he took his heart out and placed it inside him as he always wanted to save someone out of his own volition.
[spoiler="True Name and Noble Phantasm"]His true name is Siegfried, the Dragon-Blooded Knight and the Dragon Slayer who defeated the evil dragon Fafnir with the holy sword Balmung in hand. He is a great national hero of Germany that has many different depictions in the various legends attributed to him.
His Noble Phantasm is his sword Balmung, which is capable of releasing a massive energy attack.[/spoiler]
Source: TYPE-MOON Wiki
name: Kuro no Saber
